All your favorite dishes and a variety of hand-crafted menus under one roof.



Package A

Rs.2500

Rich, flavorful and laced with wine, this creamy chicken pasta is a family favorite. No one ever guesses its so quick and easy!

  • Creamy chicken pasta
  • 1pc Barbeque
  • Spaghetti
  • Fish Fingers
  • Mac and Cheese balls
  • Carbonara
  • Deserts
  • 1 Glass Iced Tea

Package B

Rs.5000

  • Mongolian Vege

Package C

Rs.3500

A firm takeout favourite! With its signature curry flavour and yellow hue, Singapore Noodles are made with thin rice noodles, prawns/shrimp, Chinese BBQ Pork, egg and red capsicum/bell peppers. Dont fret if you dont have all the ingredients this is worth making with whatever you have!

  • Singapore fried noodles
  • Pasta
  • Club sandwich
  • Spicy chickn waffle
  • Ceylon Watalappan
  • Strawberry eclairs
  • Baked Cheesecake
  • Iced Tea
Hurry Up!! Book Now








Package D

Rs.5000

A classic Thai street food, this grilled Thai Chicken is so good that it almost converted a vegetarian.

  • Grilled Marinated Thai Chicken
  • Tom Yum Goong (Spicy Shrimp Soup)
  • Noodle Soup
  • Spicy Green Papaya Salad
  • Spicy Seafood Salad
  • Easy To Customize
  • Vanila Milk shake
  • Orange Frappe
